alert.note: Alert for Monroe (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 5:58PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong storms will impact portions of southwestern Alleghany County in west central Virginia, Pulaski, Giles, Craig, east central Wythe, Montgomery Counties in southwestern Virginia and Monroe Counties in southeastern West Virginia and the City of Radford through 630 PM EST... At 558 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong storms along a line extending from near Union to near Allisonia. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blacksburg... Christiansburg... Radford... Pulaski... Pearisburg... Dublin... and Pembroke. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
